docs: Main program module that implements wrapped token functionality with authority and fee management

instructions.name: add_fee_authority
docs: Add a new authority that can manage fees
Only callable by global authority

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be the global authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account storing authorities

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint controlled by this program

instructions.name: add_mint_authority
docs: Add a new authority that can mint tokens
Only callable by global authority

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be the global authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account storing authorities

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint controlled by this program

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize a new wrapped token with metadata and authority configuration
Sets up global config PDA and token mint

accounts.name: signer
docs: Payer for account creation

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration PDA that will store program settings

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint that will be controlled by this program

instructions.name: remove_fee_authority
docs: Remove an existing fee authority
Only callable by global authority

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be the global authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account storing authorities

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint controlled by this program

instructions.name: remove_mint_authority
docs: Remove an existing mint authority
Only callable by global authority

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be the global authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account storing authorities

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint controlled by this program

instructions.name: unwrap
docs: Burn (unwrap) tokens and record destination address
Takes burn fee that goes to fee wallet

accounts.name: signer
docs: Account burning their tokens

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint to burn from

accounts.name: signer_ata
docs: Signer's token account to burn from

accounts.name: fee_wallet
docs: Fee wallet that receives burn fees

accounts.name: fee_wallet_ata
docs: Fee wallet's token account

instructions.name: update_burn_fee_bps
docs: Update the burn fee percentage (in basis points)
Only callable by global authority

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be the global authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint controlled by this program

instructions.name: update_fee_wallet
docs: Update the wallet that receives fees
Only callable by global authority

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be the global authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint controlled by this program

instructions.name: update_global_authority
docs: Update the global authority
Only callable by global authority

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be the global authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account storing authorities

instructions.name: wrap
docs: Mint (wrap) new tokens to a receiver with optional fee
Only callable by mint authorities

accounts.name: signer
docs: Signer must be a mint authority

accounts.name: global_config
docs: Global configuration account

accounts.name: mint
docs: Token mint to create new tokens

accounts.name: fee_wallet
docs: Fee wallet that receives fees

accounts.name: fee_wallet_ata
docs: Associated token account for fee wallet

accounts.name: receiver
docs: Recipient of the minted tokens

accounts.name: receiver_ata
docs: Associated token account for receiver

types.name: AddFeeAuthorityArgs
docs: Arguments for adding a new fee authority

fields.name: new_fee_authority
docs: Public key of the new fee authority to add

types.name: AddMintAuthorityArgs
docs: Arguments for adding a new mint authority

fields.name: new_mint_authority
docs: Public key of the new mint authority to add

types.name: GlobalConfig
docs: Main configuration account that stores program settings and authorities

fields.name: global_authority
docs: The authority which can update the config and manage other authorities

fields.name: mint_authorities
docs: List of authorities that can mint tokens

fields.name: fee_authorities
docs: List of authorities that can manage fees

fields.name: mint_address
docs: Address of the token mint controlled by this config

fields.name: fee_wallet
docs: Wallet that receives all fees

fields.name: burn_fee_bps
docs: Fee percentage in basis points (1 bp = 0.01%)

fields.name: mint_counter
docs: Counter for total mint operations

fields.name: redemption_counter
docs: Counter for total redemption operations

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: InitializeArgs
docs: Arguments for initializing the program and token

fields.name: global_authority
docs: Authority that can manage the program configuration

fields.name: mint_authorities
docs: Initial list of authorities that can mint tokens

fields.name: fee_authorities
docs: Initial list of authorities that can manage fees

fields.name: fee_wallet
docs: Wallet that will receive all fees

fields.name: burn_fee_bps
docs: Initial burn fee in basis points (1 bp = 0.01%)

fields.name: token_name
docs: Name of the token

fields.name: token_symbol
docs: Symbol/ticker of the token

fields.name: token_decimals
docs: Number of decimal places

fields.name: token_uri
docs: URI for token metadata

types.name: RemoveFeeAuthorityArgs
docs: Arguments for removing a fee authority

fields.name: fee_authority_to_remove
docs: Public key of the fee authority to remove

types.name: RemoveMintAuthorityArgs
docs: Arguments for removing a mint authority

fields.name: mint_authority_to_remove
docs: Public key of the mint authority to remove

types.name: TokenRedemption
docs: Event emitted when tokens are burned for redemption

fields.name: redeemer
docs: Address burning the tokens

fields.name: value
docs: Amount of tokens burned (after fee)

fields.name: dest_addr
docs: Destination address on external chain

fields.name: fee
docs: Fee amount taken

fields.name: mint
docs: Token mint address

fields.name: id
docs: Unique identifier for this redemption

types.name: TokensMintedWithFee
docs: Event emitted when tokens are minted with a fee

fields.name: recipient
docs: Address receiving the tokens

fields.name: value
docs: Amount of tokens minted (after fee)

fields.name: fee
docs: Fee amount taken

fields.name: mint
docs: Token mint address

fields.name: id
docs: Unique identifier for this mint

types.name: UnwrapArgs
docs: Arguments for unwrapping (burning) tokens

fields.name: value
docs: Amount of tokens to burn

fields.name: dest_addr
docs: Destination address on external chain

types.name: UpdateBurnFeeBpsArgs
docs: Arguments for updating the burn fee

fields.name: new_burn_fee_bps
docs: New burn fee in basis points (1 bp = 0.01%)

types.name: UpdateFeeWalletArgs
docs: Arguments for updating the fee wallet

fields.name: new_fee_wallet
docs: New wallet address that will receive fees

types.name: UpdateGlobalAuthorityArgs
docs: Arguments for updating the global authority

fields.name: new_global_authority
docs: Public key of the new global authority

types.name: WrapArgs
docs: Arguments for wrapping (minting) tokens

fields.name: value
docs: Total amount to mint

fields.name: fee
docs: Fee amount to take from total
